text: “Ia akɨrim ragh Ikiavɨra Itir God, gasaragh arazir kuram damutɨ, a dughiar bar kuram ia bagh anemadagh, egh bizir ia damuasava amiba, an adar amightɨ, da pazɨv otiv, ia damutɨ ia okam nɨghnɨgh bar osemegham. Egh ian arazir kuraba bangɨn, an osɨmtɨziba ia danɨngtɨ, ian apaniba bar ia gasɨghasigh bar zuamɨra ia agɨvagham.
